statements: DELETE FROM music_sales_data WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND sale_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM music_sales WHERE sale_id = 100 AND artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
DELETE FROM market_demand WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND units_requested > 500;

DELETE FROM sales_regions WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';

DELETE FROM albums WHERE release_date < '2020-01-01' AND artist_id = (SELECT artist_id FROM artists WHERE artist_name = 'Adele')
